verses.verse: קָרַ֤עְתָּ <S%H7167><s%> that thou wouldest rend שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8064><s%> the heavens יָרַ֔דְתָּ <S%H3381><s%> that thou wouldest come down מִפָּנֶ֖יךָ <S%H6440><s%> at thy presence הָרִ֥ים <S%H2022><s%> that the mountains נָזֹֽלּוּ׃ <S%H2151><s%> might flow down

כִּקְדֹ֧חַ <S%H6919><s%> burneth אֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> fire הֲמָסִ֗ים <S%H2003><s%> As [when] the melting מַ֚יִם <S%H4325><s%> causeth the waters תִּבְעֶה־ <S%H1158><s%> to boil אֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> the fire לְהוֹדִ֥יעַ <S%H3045><s%> known שִׁמְךָ֖ <S%H8034><s%> to make thy name לְצָרֶ֑יךָ <S%H6862><s%> to thine adversaries מִפָּנֶ֖יךָ <S%H6440><s%> at thy presence גּוֹיִ֥ם <S%H1471><s%> [that] the nations יִרְגָּֽזוּ׃ <S%H7264><s%> may tremble

בַּעֲשׂוֹתְךָ֥ <S%H6213><s%> When thou didst נוֹרָא֖וֹת <S%H3372><s%> terrible things לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not נְקַוֶּ֑ה <S%H6960><s%> [which] we looked יָרַ֕דְתָּ <S%H3381><s%> not for thou camest down מִפָּנֶ֖יךָ <S%H6440><s%> at thy presence הָרִ֥ים <S%H2022><s%> the mountains נָזֹֽלּוּ׃ <S%H2151><s%> flowed down

וּמֵעוֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> For since the beginning of the world לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> or שָׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> [men] have not heard לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> or הֶאֱזִ֑ינוּ <S%H238><s%> nor perceived by the ear עַ֣יִן <S%H5869><s%> neither hath the eye לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> or רָאָ֗תָה <S%H7200><s%> seen אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> O God זוּלָ֣תְךָ֔ <S%H2108><s%> beside יַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> thee [what] he hath prepared לִמְחַכֵּה־ <S%H2442><s%> for him that waiteth לֽוֹ׃

פָּגַ֤עְתָּ <S%H6293><s%> Thou meetest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָׂשׂ֙ <S%H7797><s%> him that rejoiceth וְעֹ֣שֵׂה <S%H6213><s%> and worketh צֶ֔דֶק <S%H6664><s%> righteousness בִּדְרָכֶ֖יךָ <S%H1870><s%> thee in thy ways יִזְכְּר֑וּךָ <S%H2142><s%> [those that] remember הֵן־ <S%H2005><s%> Behold אַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> You קָצַ֙פְתָּ֙ <S%H7107><s%> behold thou art wroth וַֽנֶּחֱטָ֔א <S%H2398><s%> for we have sinned בָּהֶ֥ם עוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> in those is continuance וְנִוָּשֵֽׁעַ׃ <S%H3467><s%> and we shall be saved

וַנְּהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> have become כַטָּמֵא֙ <S%H2931><s%> But we are all as an unclean כֻּלָּ֔נוּ <S%H3605><s%> for all וּכְבֶ֥גֶד <S%H899><s%> rags עִדִּ֖ים <S%H5708><s%> [are] as filthy כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all צִדְקֹתֵ֑ינוּ <S%H6666><s%> [thing] and all our righteousnesses וַנָּ֤בֶל <S%H5034><s%> wither כֶּֽעָלֶה֙ <S%H5929><s%> as a leaf כֻּלָּ֔נוּ <S%H3605><s%> and all וַעֲוֹנֵ֖נוּ <S%H5771><s%> and our iniquities כָּר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> like the wind יִשָּׂאֻֽנוּ׃ <S%H5375><s%> have taken us away

וְאֵין־ <S%H369><s%> There קוֹרֵ֣א <S%H7121><s%> And [there is] none that calleth בְשִׁמְךָ֔ <S%H8034><s%> upon thy name מִתְעוֹרֵ֖ר <S%H5782><s%> that stirreth up לְהַחֲזִ֣יק <S%H2388><s%> himself to take hold בָּ֑ךְ כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הִסְתַּ֤רְתָּ <S%H5641><s%> of thee for thou hast hid פָנֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H6440><s%> thy face מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> and hast וַתְּמוּגֵ֖נוּ <S%H4127><s%> from us and hast consumed בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> us because עֲוֹנֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H5771><s%> of our iniquities

וְעַתָּ֥ה <S%H6258><s%> now יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God אָבִ֣ינוּ <S%H1><s%> thou [art] our father אָ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> you אֲנַ֤חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we הַחֹ֙מֶר֙ <S%H2563><s%> we [are] the clay וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> and You יֹצְרֵ֔נוּ <S%H3335><s%> and thou our potter וּמַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <S%H4639><s%> and we all [are] the work יָדְךָ֖ <S%H3027><s%> of thy hand כֻּלָּֽנוּ׃ <S%H3605><s%> and all

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּקְצֹ֤ף <S%H7107><s%> Be not wroth יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> O LORD עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> beyond מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> very sore וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not לָעַ֖ד <S%H5703><s%> for ever תִּזְכֹּ֣ר <S%H2142><s%> neither remember עָוֹ֑ן <S%H5771><s%> iniquity הֵ֥ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold הַבֶּט־ <S%H5027><s%> behold see נָ֖א <S%H4994><s%> now עַמְּךָ֥ <S%H5971><s%> we beseech thee we [are] all thy people כֻלָּֽנוּ׃ <S%H3605><s%> all

עָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> cities קָדְשְׁךָ֖ <S%H6944><s%> Thy holy הָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> have become מִדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> are a wilderness צִיּוֹן֙ <S%H6726><s%> Zion מִדְבָּ֣ר <S%H4057><s%> is a wilderness הָיָ֔תָה <S%H1961><s%> has become יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem שְׁמָמָֽה׃ <S%H8077><s%> a desolation

בֵּ֧ית <S%H1004><s%> house קָדְשֵׁ֣נוּ <S%H6944><s%> Our holy וְתִפְאַרְתֵּ֗נוּ <S%H8597><s%> and our beautiful אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> Where הִֽלְל֙וּךָ֙ <S%H1984><s%> praised אֲבֹתֵ֔ינוּ <S%H1><s%> where our fathers הָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> has been לִשְׂרֵ֣פַת <S%H8316><s%> thee is burned up אֵ֑שׁ <S%H784><s%> with fire וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all מַחֲמַדֵּ֖ינוּ <S%H4261><s%> and all our pleasant things הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> have become לְחָרְבָּֽה׃ <S%H2723><s%> are laid waste

הַעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> at אֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these תִתְאַפַּ֖ק <S%H662><s%> Wilt thou refrain יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Jehovah תֶּחֱשֶׁ֥ה <S%H2814><s%> silent וּתְעַנֵּ֖נוּ <S%H6031><s%> and afflict עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> beyond מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> diligently ס
